network

Class RemotePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.RemotePlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RemotePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class handles a players connection, calling updates on a ServerGame object as they are recieved, and handles queueing and sending of UpdateEvents to the player
    Author:
    Bryden Frizzell

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemotePlayer

        public RemotePlayer(int id,
            java.net.Socket sock,
            ServerGame game,
            int mapWidth,
            int mapHeight)
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the player this represents
        sock - the socket connected to the player
        game - the ServerGame object for updates to be called on
        mapWidth - the width of the map, used for de-packing locations
        mapHeight - the height of the map, used for de-packing locations
